page.title: 09MR EDDIE COWELL - THE MAYOR
page.content: MR AND MRS COWELL HAD A BUSY DAY WHEN WE SPOKE TO THEM, STARTING WITH THEIR VISIT TO US. AFTER THIS, THEY WERE GOING TO THE GUILDHALL TO ENTERTAIN THE CITY'S CHIEF OFFICERS. IN THE AFTERNOON THE MAYOR HAD TO PRESENT LONG SERVICE AWARDS TO COUNCIL WORKERS AND THEN HE WAS MEETING AN M.P. FOR THE OPENING OF A SMALL FIRMS CENTRE. IN THE EVENING THEY WERE ATTENDING THE PRIMARY SCHOOLS MUSIC FESTIVAL AND THEN GOING ON TO THE ADULT TRAINING CENTRE FOR THE MENTALLY HANDICAPPED FOR A SOCIAL EVENING. MRS COWELL WAS ABLE TO GO WITH THE MAYOR TO THESE FUNCTIONS AS IT WAS HER DAY OFF WORK. THE MAYOR HAS TO REFUSE MANY INVITATIONS, BUT HE AND THE MAYORESS HAVE BEEN TO MANY DIFFERENT PLACES DURING THE LAST YEAR INCLUDING SCHOOLS, FACTORIES AND GARDEN PARTIES.
